name: LogosQuiz
description:
Logo Quiz is a downloadable puzzle game by Atico Mobile S.L., designed for smartphones and tablets.

It includes several levels that each one of them contains images of companies' logos whith several parts removed, on which the player needs to identify the logo, and type in the name of the company that uses thie logo. The

By typing in correctly a certain number of logos in a level, the next level will be unlocked.
